languages.text: {n}Комиссар отвечает бесстрашной самодовольной улыбкой.{/n} "Давай узнаем? Интересно, кому они поверят — своему "брату по оружию", который обещает им скорое спасение, или высокородно{mf|му|й} аристократ{mf|у|ке} без внятного плана побега?"

{n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'brother in arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or the highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар отвечает бесстрашной самодовольной улыбкой.{/n} "Давай узнаем? Интересно, кому они поверят — своему "брату по оружию", который обещает им скорое спасение, или высокородно{mf|му|й} аристократ{mf|у|ке} без внятного плана побега?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'comrade-in-arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or a highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委脸上挂着自信、得意的笑容。{/n}“你想知道答案吗？那就看看他们相信谁吧。他们是会相信承诺会带他们一起逃出这个地方的战友，还是会相信连个具体计划都没有的纨绔子弟？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'brother in arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or the highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"

traits.locale_text: {n}政委脸上挂着自信、得意的笑容。{/n}“你想知道答案吗？那就看看他们相信谁吧。他们是会相信承诺会带他们一起逃出这个地方的战友，还是会相信连个具体计划都没有的纨绔子弟？”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは自信に満ちた笑みを浮かべて答える。{/n}「やってみますか？早急な脱出を約束してくれる"戦友"と、具体的な計画のないハイボーンの口だけの男…果たして彼らはどちらを信じるでしょうね？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'brother in arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or the highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは自信に満ちた笑みを浮かべて答える。{/n}「やってみますか？早急な脱出を約束してくれる"戦友"と、具体的な計画のないハイボーンの口だけの男…果たして彼らはどちらを信じるでしょうね？」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario responde con una sonrisa rebosante de superioridad y confianza.{/n} «¿Quiere probar? Veamos si creen a su hermano de armas, que les promete un escape próximo, o a{mf|l| la} bocazas noble sin ningún tipo de plan».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'brother in arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or the highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario responde con una sonrisa rebosante de superioridad y confianza.{/n} «¿Quiere probar? Veamos si creen a su hermano de armas, que les promete un escape próximo, o a{mf|l| la} bocazas noble sin ningún tipo de plan».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'brother in arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or the highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire vous répond avec un sourire complaisant.{/n} « Vous voulez le savoir ? Voyons qui ils préfèrent croire entre leur "frère d'armes" qui leur promet une évasion expéditive et une grande gueule née avec une cuillère en argent dans la bouche qui n'a pas le moindre plan à leur proposer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'brother in arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or the highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire vous répond avec un sourire complaisant.{/n} « Vous voulez le savoir ? Voyons qui ils préfèrent croire entre leur "frère d'armes" qui leur promet une évasion expéditive et une grande gueule née avec une cuillère en argent dans la bouche qui n'a pas le moindre plan à leur proposer. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar antwortet mit einem hochmütigen, selbstbewussten Lächeln.{/n} "Möchtet Ihr es herausfinden? Mal sehen, wem sie glauben – ihrem 'Waffenbruder', der ihnen eine rasche Flucht verspricht, oder {mf|dem hochwohlgeborenen Schwätzer|der hochwohlgeborenen Schwätzerin} ohne konkreten Plan?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'brother in arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or the highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar antwortet mit einem hochmütigen, selbstbewussten Lächeln.{/n} "Möchtet Ihr es herausfinden? Mal sehen, wem sie glauben – ihrem 'Waffenbruder', der ihnen eine rasche Flucht verspricht, oder {mf|dem hochwohlgeborenen Schwätzer|der hochwohlgeborenen Schwätzerin} ohne konkreten Plan?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, ukalaca ve kendine güvenen bir gülümsemeyle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Denemek ister misin? Bakalım kime inanacaklar. Onlara bir an önce kaçacaklarının sözünü veren 'silah arkadaşlarına' mı yoksa doğru düzgün bir planı olmayan, soylu bir boşboğaza mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar answers with a smug, confident smile.{/n} "Care to find out? Let's see who they believe, their 'brother in arms' who promises them an expeditious escape, or the highborn loudmouth without a concrete plan?"

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
